A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The second worst Star Wars film created (only better than VII because VII set up the folly of VIII and wasn't a complete remake of V). A terrible story\, horrible character development\, and useless story arcs are only the beginning of the criticism of the film. Plot holes and plot set-ups were entirely dropped and the story veered down a predictable and childish route\, along with the humor. VII and especially VIII try to mimic the success George Lucas saw with the original trilogy\, but end up making a cliche\, knockoff parody of the originals. The traditional view of the Force has been all but abandoned and the original characters morphed into completely different utterances of themselves - pathetic might I add. The film was a great disappointment and the franchise is becoming like the Marvel movies where there will be a couple of good films (Rouge One)\, but 80% of them will be complete trash (VII sand VIII). I mourn the death of Star Wars and I hope Disney repents of their terrible actions they've made.
